name: The Sustainers spółka z ograniczoną odpowiedzialnością
goal: The Sustainers is a private-owned company that focuses on mainstreaming sustainability. Our work focuses on sustainability consultancy for private, public and research and innovation sector as well as supporting sustainable production and consumption, including transition into circular economy.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Consumers, Energy, Environment, International co-operation and development, Regional Policy
euInitiatives:
Circular Economy Package,
legislation on non-financial reporting for companies and other initiatives on corporate social responsibility,
environmental regulations
